translations: n．重新调整，再适应：对事物进行重新调整或适应的过程。
· The company is going through a period of readjustments.
这家公司正在经历一段重新调整的时期。

sentences.sentence: He has made a number of readjustments to his technique.
sentences.translation: 他对自己的技术作了不少调整。

sentences.sentence: If you trust someone who blew all six questions, you need some readjustments.
sentences.translation: 如果你信任的某个人这六个问题全都没有通过，那么你需要一些调整。

sentences.sentence: The heterogeneities of the F1 genomes were associated with the readjustments in DNA methylation pattern.
sentences.translation: F1代基因组的杂合性与基因组DNA甲基化模式的重新调整有关。
